DOC.detailed_description: PRIMARY OBJECTIVES : ( A ) To assess effectiveness propose educational model inform decision Prostate Cancer high risk men age 40 compare inform decision make share decision making ( B ) improve knowledge prostate cancer men age 18 OUTLINE : Participants complete educational intervention comprise 10-20 minute PowerPoint presentation give experience healthcare professional discus prostate cancer fact , screen guideline , risk , benefit , consequence . Some participant undergo screen exam comprise prostate specific antigen level digital rectal exam . After completion study , participant follow periodically .
